input: joke: Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything.
validityText:
This input appears to be a joke, as it follows the typical format of a setup ("Why don't scientists trust atoms?") followed by a punchline ("Because they make up everything."). The content of the joke uses the concept of atoms to create humor, which is subjective, thus adhering to the specification that the joke can include any content. There are no violations as per the provided specification, as the input fulfills the criteria of being a coherent joke. 

OK
